CustomField.description: Solution to show Currency as Dollar sign ($) instead of CurrencyCode in an environment with Multi-currency enabled (visible to external users - ROOFPRO Contractors).
CustomField.formula: "$" & IF( Payment_Amount_Due__c >= 1000000, TEXT(FLOOR(Payment_Amount_Due__c / 1000000)) & ",", "") & IF( Payment_Amount_Due__c >= 1000, RIGHT(TEXT(FLOOR(Payment_Amount_Due__c / 1000)), 3) & ",", "") & RIGHT(TEXT(FLOOR(Payment_Amount_Due__c )), 3) & "." & IF( MOD(Payment_Amount_Due__c , 1) * 100 < 10, "0" & TEXT(ROUND(MOD(Payment_Amount_Due__c , 1), 2) * 100), TEXT(MIN(ROUND(MOD(Payment_Amount_Due__c , 1), 2) * 100, 99)) )
CustomField.label: All Net Amounts
